questions:

B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Accessibility signage

B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) On a stone wall

A) A peaceful nature scene

C) An accessibility direction sign
D) A family gathering

B) A landscape

D) A building

B) Down
C) Left and right

C) Stone
D) Glass

B) Rough

D) Soft

A) Freestanding
B) Mounted

A) Decoration

B) To show direction

C) Diagonal
